data.comment: The match has started, with Stoke kicking-off.
In the minute 46, Coventry kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Stoke's Jordan Thompson has been booked in Birmingham.
Joe Allen is on a sub for Jordan Thompson for Stoke.
In the minute 74, Amadou Bakayoko is replacing Ben Sheaf for the home team.
Coventry make their second substitution with Maxime Biamou replacing Matt Godden.
The home team replace Callum O`Hare with Jordan Shipley.
The match has come to a close in Birmingham. The final score is 0-0.
